DataShape.description: Retrieves the UserExtension properties needed for Push
DataShape.name: GitBackup.UserExtensionProperties.DataShape

FieldDefinition.description: User-specific GitBackup Committer Email. Will be used instead the committer email specified at the Thing level, if UseGitCommitUserValues is set to true.
FieldDefinition.name: GitCommitterEmail

FieldDefinition.description: User-specific GitBackup Committer Name. Will be used instead the committer name specified at the Thing level, if UseGitCommitUserValues is set to true.
FieldDefinition.name: GitCommitterName

FieldDefinition.description: This property is used to decide of the Push will use the GitBackup Thing committer name and email, or the user specific values
FieldDefinition.name: UseGitCommitUserValues
